QuestData.Title: Queen of the Clefthoof
QuestData.Description: Laara told me that they have Banthar here! Or rather, that she's still alive back now. Did what I just said make any sense?$B$BThis is our chance, commander. We can defeat a younger, more powerful version of Banthar and really stick it to these rangari.$B$BWe'll show Laara how a true professional works.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A younger, more powerful version than the one on Outland. Return with her horn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Horn of Banthar from Banthar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Banthar's horn. Hemet would be green with envy to have another shot at such a powerful beast.
QuestData.RewardText: Magnificent kill, commander. You've done us all proud.
